subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Mayfield, who made Nascar's Chase for the Nextel Cup in each of its first two years, will need a miracle to make it three in a row.
snippet: Jeremy Mayfield, who made Nascar's Chase for the Nextel Cup in each of its first two years, will need a miracle to make it three in a row.
